msg: Modified requirement of Ant from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1 for better support of Tiger.

msg: Removed temporary scripting elements for Tiger thanks to Ant 1.6.1's full support of J2SE 1.5

author: iasandcb
msg: Removed tiger.home. Instead, use JAVA_HOME (to your Tiger home).
